teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Texas
teams.loan_because: Texas does it bigger!

teams.name: Viet Nam Veterans For Progress
teams.loan_because: As young men and women we spent part of our youth in South East Asia and saw great poverty. We loan to  those who are still there so they may have a chance for a better life.
teams.description: We are mainly military veterans and their families who wish to once again help those who are less fortunate than ourselves.

teams.name: Seattle
teams.description: The Seattle Kiva Lending Team is for people who love Kiva as much as they do Seattle.

teams.name: KivaFriends - Agriculture Loans
teams.loan_because: we want to reduce world hunger.  This includes loans for farming, livestock, poultry, and the like.
teams.description: Our group makes loans to people that create more food for those in the world.  Many of these entrepreneurs are farmers that often request loans to help them with their crops.  Many times these loans are for a longer repayment period.

teams.name: KiVegas (Las Vegas Kiva)
teams.loan_because: It is our way of paying back for the millions of visitors to Las Vegas and the hope that many others might one day visit Las Vegas or basically a more productive way to invest funds we might otherwise lose at the craps table.
teams.description: Those who love Las Vegas, and those beloved of Las Vegas

teams.name: Team Iversen
teams.loan_because:
"If you give a man a fish, he has food for one day. Teach a man to fish, and he has food for a lifetime"
We do this because we believe in helping people help themselves!
teams.description:
We are a thankful family from Norway. Living in one of the riches countries in the world, and even if we from time to time have a challenging situation, it is nothing compered to many other places in the world.
We are happy to share our fortune...

teams.name: iPeace
teams.loan_because: We care and we can
teams.description:
Sharing Peace, Making A Difference. 

iPeace is not an organization. It's an organism. It's alive, and it's made out of people; It is made from you, her him, them, us and me. It is not for profit and it is not for prestige. It is for peace. Period.


iPeace is a wiki-organism that believes in unity, sharing and love. iPeace believes in the tremendous power of people, when united together, to make a true change in the world.


Sharing Peace. Making A Difference. If each one of us makes the pledge to reduce pain in out world just by a little bit, our impact will be tremendous. Fight poverty, violence, hunger or prejudice. Help our children get better education or do something for our planet. The aggregate of the little changes will make our world more peaceful.


iPeace will be a hub to ALL peace initiatives in the world. You'll be able to come here and educate yourself about what's going on and where, and also share YOUR knowledge. We will cooperate and give support to all peace initiatives, as long as they are non violent and non profit.

teams.name: Slow Food Supporters
teams.loan_because: In our current global food system, the first to get left behind in a crisis will be those in developing areas. It is precisely these people whom Kiva gives us the opportunity to help through their loan program.
teams.description: We are Slow Food supporters who also believe in helping to redistribute opportunity through agricultural and food related loans.  We promote and facilitate good, clean and fair development through the work of the Slow Food movement and through our Kiva loans.

teams.name: Paying It Forward
teams.loan_because: We feel our lives have benefitted from the generosity of others and want to "Pay It Forward' by helping others through Kiva loans.  Join us if you want to return some favours to the world.
teams.description: The cost of one 'dinner out for two' is enough for people working their way out of poverty to have the chance to improve their lives. Repaid loans can continue to be relent over and over into the future, helping many hundreds in our lifetimes.

teams.name: Downsizer.net
teams.loan_because: We want to help others help themselves.
teams.description: Downsizer is a not-for-profit online community, a resource for people who want to live more sustainably.

teams.name: Team Permaculture
teams.loan_because: We want to reinvest our surpluses in eco-social regeneration!
teams.description: Mutually supportive functionally interconnected mycelial network of permaculture actionists.

teams.name: GreenhornLenders
teams.loan_because: We loan to young farmers in the United States, who are just starting out and are committed to something akin to The Farmer's Pledge, restoring soil fertility, and who are not in denial of Peak Oil. We loan to U.S. farmers, because we cannot afford for them to stop growing food. We loan to them, because young farmers need support now, and we now know that we cannot rely on any government agency. We loan because our loans go beyond food production, and reach deep into the hearts and minds of all who benefit in the food chain.
teams.description:
Our team is committed to local food security and helping farmers educate their neighbors about how to re-establish local food production. Never again should a country's people starve because they were forced to export their crops. No longer shall family farms be destroyed by immoral debt relationships. We support young farmers, the greenhorns, those who are taking over land stewardship and who feed us. 

This Team loans only to young and beginning farmers in the U.S.A.

teams.name: none of the above
teams.loan_because: why not?

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Bloggers
teams.loan_because:
bloggers and their readers are generous people too. You don't have to run a blog to join the group. If you do run a blog, invite your readers/fans to join the group!

Just like blogs, our  money and support have no boundaries either.
teams.description: This group was created to bring together all types of Bloggers and their readers&fans who lend on Kiva.

teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: Feminist Mormon Housewives
teams.loan_because: our substance belongs not to us, but to God. (Mosiah 4:22)
teams.description: Angry Activists with diapers to change.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: CIC
teams.loan_because: Influencing the world one loan at a time.
teams.description: Group of family and friends

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Team Toronto
teams.loan_because: The people who are lucky enough to live in Toronto care about creating a self sustaining legacy in all parts of civilization, and wish that economic conditions in more of the world could be like they are here.
teams.description: This team began with one person, but soon gained strength and momentum through the generosity of the people of Toronto, Canada and their friends. Now this team has over 300 members, has loaned hundreds of thousands of dollars over the past six years and is helping people all over the world. Join us today!!

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Saskatchewan
teams.loan_because: Spreading the boom is a great idea!
teams.description: We're a loose amalgamation of everyday normal people living in what some people would call the middle of nowhere!

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Newfoundland and Labrador
teams.loan_because: Our history is about struggle and helping our fellow citizens
teams.description:
We are from a province of Canada with a population of less than one million people. We are the oldest British colony and the newest Canadian province.  Sixty years a province of Canada. 
We are known for our generosity and willingness to help others in need. Canadian statistics have shown us to be among the most charitable people in Canada. 
I believe that our historic struggle to survive for over 500 years has instilled in us a common bond with people in need of a helping hand of kindness.

teams.name: Rabid Atheists
teams.loan_because: We like to help the best we can.
teams.description: We're a collection of atheist animals, whose owners like to lend in our names.  We're atheists; none of that agnostic or non-religious stuff for us!  And no, none of us really has rabies.  I hope.

teams.name: Ecoki
teams.loan_because:
Ecoki.com is dedicated to supporting the concept of Triple Bottom Line.

People, Planet, Profit.
teams.description: Through ecoki.com we are trying to get as many loans made as possible. Please join and help out fellow hard working entrepreneurs!

teams.name: The Noodle Box Canada
teams.loan_because: We started our business 7 years ago with a small loan from someone that cared, and now run a successful restaurant chain.

teams.name: Contemporary Christians
teams.loan_because: God calls us to act.
teams.description: We are a small group of Presbyterians (or friends of Presbyterians) that worship in Denton, Texas.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Humanist
teams.loan_because: It takes people to help people.  We believe in good.
teams.description:
Humanists strive to live good and ethical lives, with no belief in the supernatural.  We give meaning and purpose to our lives through reason, compassion and action.

Most Atheists and non-religious people ARE Humanists, but most don't realize it!

Our team helps the poor, builds the Humanist community and shows that non-religious people give, care and share.

We are endorsed by the American Humanist Association, British Humanist Association and International Humanist and Ethical Union.

teams.name: Kiva Korea
teams.loan_because: We have a common interest of directly helping those who need help and support the independent nature of microfinance.
teams.description: We are people connected simply by living in Korea, whether Korean citizens or foreigners living here.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: Team CANADA

http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.name: KivaFriends.org

teams.description: We are a community for lenders by lenders. We welcome Kiva.org lenders to participate in our lender forums at KivaFriends.org

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Team Japan
teams.loan_because: we feel that we can help the world, one person at a time.
teams.description:
There are many Kiva lenders who live in Japan, and we hope to be able to make a difference, not only as individuals, but now as a team. Please feel free to join us....not only from anywhere in Japan, but anywhere in the world. All you need is an interest in Japan. 

一緒に貧困をなくしましょう．．．お待ちしています！

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Friendly Manitoba
teams.loan_because: Although charity has its place, there is also a need for recycleable seed money to allow one in need to help oneself. The people of Manitoba are generous with the former and now through Kiva can provide the latter.
teams.description: The people of Manitoba are both generous and heavily supportive of the entreprenurial spirit that allows someone to make their own lot in life better. We respect how a Kiva loan can influence not just the recipient but their family, villiage and country as well.

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas
teams.loan_because: We are big-hearted Texans and citizens of the world who enjoy sharing our prosperity and making a positive difference in the world.
teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: Luna Field Farm for Global Farmers
teams.loan_because: We see value in supporting small scale farmers and entrepreneurs around the world.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: 101 Cookbooks
teams.loan_because: There were nearly a million visits to 101 Cookbooks last month - a statistic that continues to amaze me. As the site has grown over the years, I kept thinking to myself that it would be great to figure out a way for us to affect change as a group - Kiva (with its team lending) is a great way for us to do that.
teams.description: Readers of Heidi Swanson's online recipe journal (blog) 101cookbooks.com

teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: Smile Train
teams.loan_because:
There are millions of children with unrepaired cleft lips and palates who have little to no prospect of ever being helped. Their parents are so poor they could never afford surgery. Being born with a cleft in a developing country is truly a curse, and no one knows how many newborns with clefts are killed or abandoned right after birth.  

Through Smile Train's free cleft surgery program, a 45 minute surgery gives these children a future and a second chance at life that they never thought they'd get. Let's change the world, one smile at a time!

Through our Kiva lending we want to raise awareness and support of the wonderful work Smile Train does in providing free cleft repair surgeries around the world. If our team logo is displayed on loans' top lending teams we hope other Kiva lenders will learn about Smile Train's work too.  Won't you join us?
.
teams.description:
We are a diverse group of Kiva lenders from different backgrounds and different areas of the world who share a common desire to support the effort to bring a repair surgery to every child who needs one.  Our team also includes staff members of Smile Train and Kiva and other microfinance ventures.  We would be happy for you to join our team too!

The little girl in our team logo is Pinki Sonkar.  She was born with a severe cleft into a family that was surviving on less than a dollar a day in a poor rural village in India. She could not go to school because the other children threw rocks at her.  Smile Pinki tells the story of how her life was changed forever by a free repair surgery at a Smile Train partner hospital.  Contact a team captain for more information if you would like a free DVD of this Academy Award winning documentary.

Where is Pinki Now - http://bit.ly/WhereisPinkiNow - This 5 minute video has interviews with Pinki's parents and teachers and video of Pinki in school.  You can see that cleft surgery brings a total transformation to the lives of these kids.

Wang Li Got Married - http://bit.ly/WangLi - this video tells the moving story of Smile Train's very first patient and how her life was totally changed.

Smile Train in Mexico - http://bit.ly/SmileMexico - this video is for Adrián and the Arenal Group. As a team we loaned to help his parents, and we hope that through Smile Train Adrián will get the care that he needs.

Kiva Team Smile Train fund raiser page - http://bit.ly/DonateTeamSmileTrain - If you would like to make donation to support Smile Train's work you can do so here.  Even if you don't make a donation, please sign our guest book!      Thank you for helping the kids!      

Other tax advantaged donation links:
Canada - http://www.canadahelps.org/CharityProfilePage.aspx?CharityID=s98822
Great Britain - http://www.smiletrain.org.uk/
India - http://www.smiletrainindia.org/
Italy - http://www.smiletrain.it/

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world:  http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=Smile_Train

Check our team statistics:  http://smiletrain.vijayr.net/stats.php
.

teams.name: Genealogists for Families
teams.loan_because:
we care about families (past, present and future).

'There are people trying to change this world that seems to be going down. Some people think there is nothing that can be done... But then there is you, who really do believe that it is still possible.'
teams.description:
Genealogists worldwide (plus relatives and friends) have found a simple way to help less fortunate families. In 2011 'Genealogists for Families' received an award for Best New Community Project.

Through Kiva, a non-profit organisation working with microfinance institutions, you choose a borrower to support with a loan of just $5 (through Kiva Zip) or $25 (on the main Kiva site). Similar loans by other lenders are combined until the required total is reached. This enables people without access to traditional banks (including many women) to expand their businesses, support and educate their children, save for the future and raise themselves out of poverty. As your money is repaid (often in monthly instalments), you can withdraw it or lend it to someone else. Money that is loaned over and over again does more good than a one-time donation!

Anyone *who makes a loan* through Kiva can be a member of this team. You can invite your family and friends to join even if they are not involved in genealogy.

** Please read http://genfamilies.blogspot.com/search/label/FAQ (which has important information and answers to frequently asked questions).

Nous voulons aider.
teams.description:
The political status of Québec is a province within the country of Canada (although a portion of the population would prefer Québec to become sovereign in the future).  The Parliament of Canada has recognized the Québécois as a nation. The largest city in Québec is Montréal, and the capital is also called Québec (Quebec City). The official language of Québec is French.

If you'd like to come and visit us, the official tourism site of the Québec government is at http://www.bonjourquebec.com

teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

teams.name: Crazy Canucks
teams.loan_because: We live in a well-to-do nation and want to help those less fortunate than ourselves
teams.description: We are CANADIAN !!!

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Boston Red Sox Fans
teams.loan_because: this is wicked more important than beating the Yankees.

teams.name: Bryn Mawr College
teams.description: Students, faculty, staff, alumni and friends of Bryn Mawr College.

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.
